revised_title: Researches on Gun-Cotton: Composition and Manufacturing
tldr: The author investigates the composition and manufacturing process of gun-cotton, a key component in gunpowder. They discuss the various methods and formulas used by different chemists to analyze and produce gun-cotton, and the differences in their results. The author also examines the solubility and explosive properties of gun-cotton, and the impact of different acid mixtures on its composition.
